articles.author: Lynne Kelleher
articles.title: How do Irish teachers' wages compare with those in Europe? - Irish Examiner
articles.content: Irish teachers are paid just over a third of their Swiss counterpart's pay packet when they first go into a classroom, but they earn over seven times the salary of Albanian teachers.A new European Co… [+5075 chars]

articles.author: Adrian Padeanu
articles.title: Mazda CX-3 Production For Europe Ending In December - Motor1
articles.description: Mazda Poland's PR has announced production of the CX-3 for Europe will come to an end in December. The small crossover has already been discontinued in the US.
articles.content: [UPDATE] Mazda Germany has confirmed in a phone call with Motor1.com that production of the CX-3 for the European market will be terminated at the end of the year. It will continue for other markets.… [+1960 chars]
